title: Haggar Men's Casual Classic Fit Denim Trouser Pant-Regular and Big & Tall Sizes
description: COMFORT: This cotton denim is both a traditional staple for your wardrobe. The comfort of the hidden expandable waistband stretches up to 3" so you will look and feel your best all day!
FEATURES: This flat front pant offers off-seam pockets, no iron fabric in a classic fit.
STYLE: Whether you step into the office or out on the weekend, these pants will fit your need perfectly. A timeless staple to your wardrobe.
HIDDEN EXPANDABLE WAISTBAND: There is no shortage of comfort here! The hidden expandable waistband at your mid-section provides ideal comfort without any visible spandex.
EASY CARE: Best of all, this pant is machine washable!
HAGGAR Mens Casual Classic Fit Denim Trouser Pant-Regular and Big & Tall Sizes
